title: Jessica Mauboy reveals the hilarious moment Themeli Magripilis nearly tripped while proposing
text:
She recently got engaged to her long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis in Greece.

And on Thursday, Jessica Mauboy opened up about the hilarious moment her fiance almost tripped while getting down on one knee.

During an interview on The Project, the 30-year-old singer revealed that the romantic proposal took place on a rocky beach and 'he just trying to keep his balance'.

'There were pebbles everywhere!' Jessica Mauboy (pictured) has revealed the hilarious moment her boyfriend Themeli Magripilis almost tripped while proposing

'There were pebbles everywhere...but it was very special,' she explained.

Jessica's appearance on The Project comes one day after she confirmed she is set to marry her boyfriend of more than 10 years.

Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, the singer shared a snap of herself and Themeli and revealed that she had gotten engaged during a recent holiday in Greece.

Romantic: Jessica (pictured) recently got engaged while on holidays in Greece with her long-term boyfriend

'But it was very special': Jessica (pictured) revealed that the romantic proposal took place on a rocky beach (pictured above) and 'he just trying to keep his balance'

'The love of my life proposed to me in his family’s home town of Kalymnos, Greece on the beach at sunset,' she wrote.

'We are so happy. I can’t wait to spend the rest of my life with my best friend. Thank you for all the love. BIG LOVE JM & Themeli,' she added.

As she returned home from the holiday, Jessica was asked about her engagement by paparazzi at Sydney Airport and confessed it was unexpected.

It's official! Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, the singer shared a snap of herself and Themeli (left) and revealed that she had gotten engaged

'It is very exciting. It was a big surprise in fact, it was pretty crazy!' she said.

Themeli, a soccer player from the Northern Territory, reportedly sought approval from his family in Greece before asking Jessica to marry him.

They first met on a night out more than a decade ago, and spent seven years in a long-distance relationship before he relocated to Sydney in 2016.

The couple are now living together in Jessica's $1.8 million two-level apartment.
description: She recently got engaged to her long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis in Greece.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
